column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Five stars for restoring my faith in Chicago deep dish.  Get the Chicago Classic with butter crust
column2: and add garlic.  The sausage they use is divine.  The butter crust is PERFECT.  The garlic on top made everything so much better.  It took a long time to get a table even at 9pm
column3: but when we FINALLY made it inside and were seated
column4: we were not disappointed by the food.  Thanks for making my last pizza in Chicago memorable!
